file_tooltips.new_file: Create a new file and reset default font and font size

text_tooltips.font: Change font in document or selected text
text_tooltips.font_size: Change font size in document or selected text
text_tooltips.copy: Copy the selected text to clipboard
text_tooltips.paste: Paste text from clipboard into document
text_tooltips.cut: Cut the selected text and copy it to clipboard
text_tooltips.select_all: Select all text in the document
text_tooltips.align_justified: Align text to both left and right margins, creating a clean and even look.
text_tooltips.text_color: Change the color of text or selected text
text_tooltips.background_color: Change the background color of the document or selected text
